aththa meka me suluwen thakanna puluwan deyak noweyi.oya widiyo eka balanakota therenawa mehema deyak wena bawa oya janamadiliya danagena idala bawa.uu witharak noweyi swarnawahiniya eeka wartha kale anthima jada widiyata.namuth bauddha samajayen me kriyawa gana agayimak labune na.soma himiyange siddhiya wage weyi kiyala samaharu kiwath siyadiwinasaganima therawadaya thula pilinoganna nisa meka wira kamak wena ekak na.methana gataluwa thiyenne mehema deyak mokak hari hethuwakata wiwidha balawega walin hamuduruwaru wenath aya gini thiyaganna polabawanna ida thibenawa.wathura tanki walata nagimath kalayak wilasithawak wuna.gini thabima ehema wenna kalin hameogema as arinna oona .nathnam somarama wage modayanta kamara issaraha gini thiyana bhikshu sampradayan bihi wennath puluwan.me hamuduruwo thalduwe somarama wage kenek.meka pitupasa buddharakkkhithala inna athi

‘katha paha’ eeriyagolla gathkathuwarayanange thawath keti katha sangrahayaki.lekhana kusalatha osse parinatha bhawayata pamini eeriyagolla mahatha parlimenthuwe unusum wada wiwada waladi siya wishwa bhasha koshayen thiyunu awi gena, prathiwadi kathikayage hisa mathata ma pahara dunne ya.nidahasa puwathpatha magin rajya wirodhi prakashayak kale yayi chodana kara walikada bandhanagaraye yakada kuru athulata ringawu parlimenthu dhura apekshakayaku wu somawira chandrasiri kawiya, kuriru duk gahata winda siragedarin kelinma parlimenthuwata pamini kathawa, ithihasaya mathaka thibena buddhimath janathawata yali sihipathkala yuthu natha.moratuwa parlimenthu manthri somawira chandrasiri kawiya parlimenthu sampradayan binda dama, ethuladi palamuwarata sinhalen sabhawa amatha, maha aragalayak kale ya.

sathpurushayan bawata pathwenta puluwan.kala guna danna kamath, kalaguna sihikaranta dakshakamath, kiyana ee dharmayan thamange jiwithayata ekathu karanta bariwunoth ehema, eyata upakara kala ayage guna sihiwenne na.

walikada bandhanagaraya thula di randawiyan 27 deneku ghathanaya kirime siddhiyata yuda hamudawata walikada bandhanagaraya thulata yamata niyoga laba dun wagakiwa yuthu niladharin sambandhayen da awadhanaya yomu kara wimarshana sidu karana lesata kolambaa athireka mahesthrath chamari wirasuriya mahathmiya eeye (22) aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa wetha niyoga kara thibenawa.

ma kiyanna oona, lisita epa
"api kohomada mechchara deyak kalata passe ekathu wenne..?
melesa himiwu illumpath atharin ...
wi busal 6 k badu dila thamayi dan eda wela jiwath wenne..‘‘

onna sahenna kalekata passe eekata aluthen pothak ekathu wenawa.

hayidrajan lohaya nishpadanaya kirima sandaha wishala wiyadamak darimata siduwanu athidayi bibisi sinhala sewaya kala wimasimata pilithuru dun ohu sandahan kale, ewani wishala wiyadamak darimata siduwanu athayi thaman wishwasa nokarana bawayi.
ethakota ratama dannawa niwaradi gowin kawuda kiyala.
ෙmonawada ee dharmatha paha, ‘idha bhikkhew, bhikkhu asubhanupassi kaey wiharathi, aahaer patikkulasanynyi ,
ee ayata mama gaurawayen sthuthiwantha wenawa.
ee wagema agamathi ranil wikramasinhage gramiya ‘modal eka’ thamayi janadhipathi maithripala sirisena kiyanne.
”kunukaraya” lesin samajagatha wu namaye himikaruwan wuwada kunu iwath karana minisunagen ituwana mila kala nohaki sewawa agayannata nithathinma apata siduwanu atha.
ee nisa yam rupa aminumak kara gannata mama me dinawala wehesunemi.
rajaya ee sandaha pahasukam sapayiya yuthuyi.
meya dewani wanne mahabanku badumkara wanchawata pamanaki.
ee nisa nidahase jiwath wena godak minissu manasin hithanne thaman kuduwaka hira karala innawa kiyalayi.
